message.body: hey how's the day going?
Heeeyyy...not bad
still busy, but with an end in sight. Got good news from a friend yesterday, too :-)
oh yeah? what's that?

we had talked about a trip to the white mtns in NH. Then I saw a photo on another buddies FB with mt. washington sign so I msg'd him about it and he sent me tons of cool info. Called my friend and we are going next month and I am totally psyched
soooo sweet. nice to have something to look forward to, right?
hey, I look forward to every weekend!
Mt. Washington is the tallest peak in the northeast, bout 6,200ft. there is a cool lake called the lake of the clouds that we are gonna check out too
lol, ok. i think there's a chance you might look forward to this one ever more.
that's awesome, and pathetic, lol. 6200. geez
relax...top point in DE is about 424ft so it's a def improvement. It also held the record for the highest wind gust recorded on the earths surface at 231mph
I'm impressed with your factual knowledge. lol when u going?
prolly 2nd or 3rd wk in aug. but enough about me. how are YOU doing?
fine. good i suppose.

not a lot going on....biggest plans on my plate are the two renovations (my kitchen, their bath), and how to keep em movin. I'm not even thinking about my next trip at the end of august. maybe it would do me some good.
getting off track with sleep, so not feelin my best.
about saturday, I'd like to go, but I'm not sure I'd be good company b/c I a lot on my mind that I want to do...
so if you have a good time in mind that we'd definitely leave by, then I'd be in, but otherwise, I'd be worrying about time, and shouldn't go.

there are options. I am working sat morning (busy) then heading to my uncles round 2 or so, prolly not staying too long (it's about an hour from here). I am also toying with the idea of going to camp, but im not sure bout that yet

ultimately I do not want you to feel uncomfortable, I just want you to do what you feel you have to do. I know there are things you would like to get accomplished, and I would be willing to help out. I would also like to give you the opportunity to get away because I feel it would do you good

My priorities for this weekend are- getting drywall, hanging it, hanging cabinets (my dad will help me with all that). Doing all the tile in my mom's bathroom (stones come in today) (her and I both have off Monday, so we could do it then at the latest). Then if socializing fits in, awesome. and Gowtham has been buggin me about a movie...I could push him off for a few days.
I also don't want to get into a spot where you are regularly not only driving up here, but then also helping with renovation. I feel like a taker, and I don't like how that feels.
So i guess more appropriately said, i don't want to get myself in that spot, lol

I thought about the bbq thing, and I realized that it may not be where you are at right now (being around a bunch of virtual strangers, etc.) so then I thought that since I wanted to go to camp, that it would be more fitting for you to get away from the city.

Im with ya on that, but I will be driving near your place anyway and I don't really mind driving. helping with renovations is something I enjoy and I feel that if it helps you out and frees up some of your time then it's worth the investment. I don't expect anything in return, it's just my way of showingmy appreciation for you company :-)
I enjoy your company too, and I am very happy to give, as well...though it's not the most convenient moment for that, lol.
What are your thoughts with camping? are you headin that way after the bbq?
that was the plan. I fig I would get a little hiking in then relax by the fire, get some rest and then head home in the morning.
that sounds awesome.

I'm just gonna go ahead with my plan, and not make any hard fast plans with you. I know last time you visited with your fam over there, it didn't really go according to plan. So I don't want you to have to factor me in to your slightly undefined plans. Why don't you give me a call...
when you have more of an idea of the timing, like when you are leaving your uncles, and we can play it by ear?

oy...I'd better get back to work. my mind is wandering more towards play than work. Give me a buzz later if ya want. Ill be busy the next couple of nights so best time to reach me is prolly later. Otherwise I will be available sat morning.
don't you work saturday morning?
ok...well ttyl
I do but you can still call/email/txt
ok, have a good one :-)
hey there.
so I was writing a reply to your email and I saw this "reply by chat to Larah" button, wierd
why does this bubble say you're offline?
ahhh
I did not want to be bothered
ah, gotcha. well thanks for IMing. it's nice to have interaction.
then I thought to myself, well its kinda silly for me to write you an email when I can just TELL you what I am thinking
even better
I would call you, but I'm writing an email.
yeah, I actually debated it as I was all into writing the email
so I am still writing the email, even though we are chatting
lol, so you're not gonna TELL me
I am, but I want to write the email regardless. im in full email writing mode. So finish your email and I will finish mine, then we can chat
little weird, lol...but I'm ok with it.
yes, I agree
ok im done
almost done...
ok im done, but Im not sure if I should send it now or wait :/
why you wanna mess with me first?
lol
nah I sent it. You can read it if you want I have to put laundry in the dryer and get a drink
ahhhhhhh
first off, thank you
for taking the time, and the effort.
I feel like....I am growing up. it feels weird to feel that.
back
'tis nothing at all
In my physical life, I live to confront my fears
Emotionally, I haven't learned how to jump yet
It has only been in the last few years that I have been able to deal with some of these emotional things
This has been with me for as long as I can remember
lol...I cant' help but laugh
I finally shook some of the big questions...I was feeling so light.
this is good though. I was feeling empty without a challenge.
big questions....challange?
I'm honestly not sure it matters.
I'm feeling lost.
lost in what way?
unsure of what direction to go in.
if I want to try and "figure this stuff out." or just forget about and move on just living, less thinking
you do realize that it is ok to not move all the time, then you don't need a direction
I find that life will make that decision for you
lol....
and oddly enough, you may find that just living will sort it out as well
Paramahansa Yogananda said " You cannot remain stationary. You must go either forward or backward."
I think you get to pause once in a while
did I every talk to you about looking for the holy grail of a town?
yes
I think I do that with relationships too
you're unravelling me, lol
hehe, I have broken through. Even after all your resistance
I have enjoyed every minute of it
lol, all 5 days of it.
you went right for the jugular, huh. not wastin any time on the small things.
perhaps, but it certainly was not planned that way
funny thing, the emails that you sent me before we met, you seemed like a different person
oh yeah? what kind of person did I seem like?
let's just say I was not intimidated at all
intimidated? and now I'm intimidating?
by the end of our first date, my head was spinning
I feel incredibly vulnerable right about now...I can't believe you're intimidated.
I didn't say I was
Well I felt fine after our first date
lol
....make that am, I didnt say I am
how the tables have turned
after spending that evening with you I realized just how complex a person you were, and i was not ready for that
so I seemed "simple" in my emails
it continued for the second date, by the third I was feeling pretty good and comfortable
not simple, just not as complex as I discovered
and much nicer haha
...can't say I ever judged you based on your emails.
well emails obviously dont tell the whole story, I guess I kinda forgot that
now I'm starting to make some preliminary hypotheses about you.
you think I am a judger
I was....Ive gotten better at not judging
I think more about you than that, but yes I do find that to be a reoccuring trend with you
it does come back from time to time
perhaps a safety mechanism of some kind, in order to sense danger
lol.
so do you think you found the holy grail of towns?
I'm not looking for it anymore.
I decided the people make the town
Idaho Springs was a fantastic town of people though.
so now you are just looking for the holy grail of relationships
ahh fuck, I don't know
ahhaah
I really don't.
Very confused at the moment.
..in case that wasn't clear
yeah I noticed that
thank god I have an accupncture appointment tomorrow. it's my non-drug of choice
I get hung up, too, b/c a lot of my friends are like me
which is exactly why we're all over the damn place
and how is that?
never satisfied
none of us can settle down, and we're all living on our own, most away from family, trying to prove we can do it on our own
always searching
I talked to a buddy today that I have always felt drawn to, but he's been so internal we never really had a solid friendship. just happned to cross paths today and he's in a really similiar spot. odd
always searching...lol yea
I wonder if I'll ever be able to settle. and how I'll decide.
yup
I do appreciate you doing this...
as uncomfortable as I am, I very much value what you've done.
It's a rare person that has been able to do that.
at all

I just dont feel like I am where I should be. I wonder if it's because I havent found a place that I feel at home at, or if it's something else that is lacking in my life that I seem to think I will find somewhere else
is that why the line "home's anywhere you are too" resonated?
exactly, glad to see you are paying attention
normally at this point I would cut you off and say I need to go to sleep, but Im not really sure how well I will sleep at this point so I am allowing myself to stay up another 15 min.
like i said, there are very few things I've been able to love in life, which is why I want to be in CO. but my parents are also my home. everything else in my life is disposable, or mobile
maybe you're just looking for something or someone to love, and to love you. maybe that's been going on for a while in your life.
yeah...I'm gonna go lay in bed. and force myself to get up early early to go lay my parents floor.
I'm just gonna try to get through tomorrow til I can get the release of accupuncture
how are you feeling?
let it flow kiddo....
Im feeling good but a little wired. Ive been in bed since we started chatting
wired? why? having fun? lol
not really sure. just am
so yeah I guess Im just searching for something that feels right, not ness. a place
I don't want an ordinary life. I don't settle down because I don't want to settle. I don't want an ordinary love either. Im not asking for perfection, just what is ideal for me.
I don't want an ordinary life either...And I wouldn't want my wants to be any different, but I recognize tht part of that territory is blazing my own trail.
do you feel that some of your wants are in conflict?
is that question rhetorical?
only if you want it to be?
hahaahah
I think the answer is pretty obvious.....yeah I definitely in conflict.
I'm not enough of an asshole to say "fuck you and everything abotu you, family"
I dont think that has to be the case. You just have to learn how to compromise those things
I value them very much. some of these things are mutually exclusive
or I see them that way. ...I've always been an all or nothing kind of person
maybe you need to start seeing the gray area
I'm not sure I can. I've been trying for a long time
6 or 7 yeras
I'm a person of extremes.
and part of me likes that.
hmmm. maybe you need to learn about subtleness
did I miss something subtle?
no, it's about not having to be so extreme all the time
and I think that you have improved in that department
right...I'm trying. very little progress made
you seem to have a plan. you want to teach biology, you bought a house
"something told me to run, and hunny, you know me, it's all or none." more lyrics...different song from missy higgins.
lol, I don't have a plan.
and you adopted meadow
I mean on paper I do
I've always wanted a dog.
I will never let her go. no matter what happens in my life.
but its a responsibility you didnt have before
I bought the house before I had a clue about school.
I'm not sure if I'm a square peg in this round hole society, or if I'm just too stubborn.
Part of me wants a simple life, a 9-5 job, simple pleasures.
well I wouldnt worry too much about that
Part of me knows that'll never work. and I should just leap frog that step.
But it seems like a good stepping stone, if nothing else. and once I got the tuition covered, I figured I had nothing to lose but time
its ok to not be sure. Hell Im still not sure
yeah it made sense...it was logical.
logic has kept me from doing lots of crazy things
i like doing crazy things...may I should do more of them.
but I think that key is to not worry about others expectations and just find what works for you. There will have to be sacrifices, you cant have it all
people think I have all this courage, and I do brave stuff all the time, the irony is, fear drives my life.
I'm not so sure, I might just have it all.
lol
but you just said that some of the things you want are mutually exclusive
good poitn.
do you want a family?
undecided
husband, kids, home?
career
I want a husbannd, but I don't feel like I can bank on that.
you and me both. I thought I would at least have that figured out by now
I don't care about getting married.
so you dont know if anyone will make the cut
but someone I can spend my life with, i want that
hmmm
hehehe
I dont 'know if I'll give anyone the chance
too funny
it's not about others falling short, it's about me falling short
there was a point in my life where I didnt believe in marriage, still don't in many ways
a piece of paper? what does that have to do with an intimate relationship with the one I love
it's been 26 minutes, hun
yea, I noticed
i mostly don't want to subject myself to the external validation.
always the rebel
my wedding would be for others.
but it doesnt have to be
if i got married the way I wanted to, it's be by a waterfall, somewhere at high elevation.
and that's a "selfish" choice, according to my parents
sorry
got booted
what was the last thing you wrote
"marriages should be where the whole family can go"
well if you want to get married by a waterfall at high elev. then do it
its your wedding, whats stopping you
lol. well I don't have a man...
hypothetically speaking
what's stopping me? the same thing that has me living in PA
letting others control the direction of your life?
ah
...you're pushing me
I think you need to stop questioning where you live. You are here for a reason. it may not make sense and you may feel out of place but it will work itself out and you will end up where you belong
trying to make everyone happy at once? avoidance of upsetting those who have been very good to me and those I love.
things don't always "work themselves out" sometimes we have to work them out ourselves.
but at what price? your own happiness?
but the things is, this is how I get.
well Im not suggesting you sit back and wait it out
I know I'm here for a reason. If nothing else, to right the relationship with my parents and to get meadow.
and maybe to appreciate things more
learn a little subtleness
if I leave, that is me running away from myself. at what point do I stop finding reasons to need to leave where I am?
you have no reason to go anywhere
at some point yes
but you will know when it is right
yeah I think I need to just move past these feelings...
and get back to being grateful for how things are here.
I know you miss CO, but its not going anywhere
there are many wonderful places in the world, but sometimes its less about location and more about figuring stuff out and learning, growing
and like you said, so much of it is the people around you
the mountains and rivers do not change, people do
all the time
rivers change too...but i get the point.
right....
k nite time. Ill pick you up at 4ish on sat.
what?
somewhere between 4 and 5?
That's early...I made plans to do house work with my dad after work on saturday.
it should work.
and I will be ready to do kitchen reno on sunday, but I cant stick around all day cuz I got stuff to take care of
we're just getting drywall...we could hang it sunday.
ok your just gtta make a deal with me
you gotta take it easy with the psychoanalysis while were in the woods
haha, you dont have to even meantion it. Why do you think I want to take you there?
it's very much an escape
can meadow come?
of course, but will she fit in my truck?
too bad my other truck is not road legal yet, it has an extended cab
she can fit on a plane, she can fit in your truck
Im sure we can make it work
is there any gear or any thing you want me to bring?
I have a tent and bags and all
I tend to travel light, especially since its just a short stay
snacks are always good though
i can bring my own bag n pad, but i mean cooking stuff, water tablets.
theres no 24 hr giant in town
lol
alright, you're keeping me up ;-)
nah we have most of the ness. up there.
the "ness" ???
necessaties
enjoy the bbq. ttyl.
k. ill call ya when I leave my uncles, prolly between 3-4 that will give you about an hr. Have a good day and enjoy your session. Gnight
